title: Change boot partition in Centos 7
body: I have installed Centos server minimal using usb flash drive, and after all done, I found that grub always boot to wrong hd, it always try to boot to (hd1,0) but my hard drive is (hd0,0). If i change root (hd0,0) it boot normally. I have tried many solution on the net to fix grub so always set root to hd0,0 but in vain. All commands just only change root at the time of booting, once I have reboot the system it return to (hd1,0). How can I cfix that issue?
